summary: A sociopathic stranger all but destroys a small hardscrabble town but the 'mayor' convinces its survivors to stay and rebuild.
cast: Henry Fonda|Janice Rule|Keenan Wynn|Janis Paige|John Anderson|Warren Oates|Fay Spain|Edgar Buchanan|Aldo Ray|Denver Pyle|Michael Shea|Arlene Golonka|Lon Chaney Jr.|Royal Dano|Alan Baxter|Paul Birch|Dan Ferrone|Paul Fix|Elisha Cook Jr.|Kalen Liu|Ann McCrea|Bob Terhune|Ron Burke|George Bruggeman|Michael Jeffers|Chuck Roberson|Earl Spainard
title: Una bala para el diablo
